description:
Relax in this sunny 1 bedroom apartment located in the heart of Nolita's incredible restaurants and shops. Everyone says that this is the best neighborhood in NYC. 

Just a 3-minute walk to the subway.

Modern yet cozy and comfortable furniture. Skylight in the living room, and a collection of books.

I have tons of recommendations for the neighborhood, and as a New York for the past 8 years, happy to suggest fun things to do in the city.

Great neighborhood of boutiques, cafes and restaurants. The "hippest" neighborhood in New York.

2 blocks from the the 6 train, and 3 from the N and R.

The apartment is up 4 flights of stairs without an elevator.
name: Light-filled 1 bedroom in Nolita/Soho
review: Liz was extremely professional and made the process easy. She brought some bagel, cheese, and drinks which I found was great. Comfy bed, shiny apartment, and strategic location. I'd definitely come back next time !!
